MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power fault in CW8 postcode area of Northwich, affecting properties in Bluebell Close, Verdin Avenue and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6PM. Our engineers have arrived  on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, we  expect the power to be restored by 9PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:23PM on 21st January 2021
